Pre-Game Insights: Malawi National Football Team has no points in Group L and has lost all their first round matches.
Malawi suffered a 4-0 defeat against Senegal in Dakar.
Malawi has lost six out of seven matches this year, winning only against Principe and São Tomé in a 2026 World Cup qualifier.
Senegal is second in the group with seven points, while Burkina Faso leads with 10 points.
Malawi coach Patrick Mabedi said the red card to goalkeeper Brighton Munthali changed the game's complexion.
Mabedi believes they need to fight for a result to make Malawians happy and to salvage some pride.
Senegal coach Pape Thiaw wants his team to be on the offensive and score more goals to catch up with Burkina Faso.
Senegal’s key players include Sadio Mane, Nicolas Jackson, Pape Gueye, and Ismaila Sarr.
